sentences.sentence: Why has evolution allowed the brain to grow so hazardously large ?
sentences.translation: 为什麽演化容许脑子发育到会威胁生命的地步？

sentences.sentence: Scientists have found many planets like HD 209458 b – huge gas giants that orbit hazardously close to their stars and have hellishly hot, poisonous atmospheres.
sentences.translation: 科学家们已经发现了许多类似HD209458b的行星- 拥有庞大的大气层，却离它们的恒星很近的运行，可怕的炎热，剧毒的大气。

sentences.sentence: This paper presents a new Receiver Autonomous Integrity Monitoring (RAIM) algorithm based on Probability of Hazardously Misleading Information (PHMI) dynamically allocated strategy.
sentences.translation: 提出一种适用于多星座情况的接收机自主完好性监测算法——基于完好性指标动态分配的完好性监测算法。
